reviews.title: Frustrating!
reviews.comment: This is a very fun game. I even recommended this game to m friends. But since the last update/maintenance, I can\'t enjoy my battle! I always got disconnected in the middle of the game and it\'s so frustrating! I played like 3 times and I never finished it because I got disconnected! Boo. Please fix it. Thank you very much!

reviews.title: Computers
reviews.comment: Not even real people anymore. Just computers.  Bots. And everything needs diamonds. And when you spend diamonds you only get the item for a few days. and if you dont play for like 7 days you lose it all. then you get stuck with the first old sucky starting stuff. you dont get two stand out if you dont buy diamonds. you basicly are weak.
